title: Vault Backup & Restore
meta: Backup and Restore your KubeVault-managed Vault cluster. You can also Backup and Restore any Vault cluster that has been deployed with Vault Helm Charts.

innerContent.title: Backup & Restore
innerContent.description: Vault provides a set of standard operating procedures (SOP) for backing up a Vault cluster. It protects your Vault cluster against data corruption or sabotage of which Disaster Recovery Replication might not be able to protect against. Stash by AppsCode lets you Backup & Restore your Vault cluster managed by KubeVault or deployed with Vault Helm-charts.
